title: Academy Path Choice
description: A simple branching adventure demonstrating the achievement system
intro_text: Welcome to the Academy! You'll explore different disciplines and choose your specialization. Your journey will shape your destiny.
success_text: Congratulations! You have mastered your chosen path and graduated from the Academy.
failure_text: Your academy journey ends here, but you can always start fresh with new wisdom.

1.title: Exploration
1.description: Discover the academy and explore different disciplines
1.intro:
**Chapter 1: Exploration Day**

Your first day at the Academy! You can explore different areas to get a feel for what interests you. There's no pressure to decide anything yet.

challenges.title: Visit the Training Grounds
challenges.description: Check out where the warriors train with weapons and physical conditioning.
challenges.code:
st.write("You watch students practicing sword forms and strength exercises.")

if st.button("üí™ Try some exercises"):
    avatar['strength'] += 2
    new_achievement('explored_combat', 'Combat Explorer', 'You explored the martial training grounds')
    st.success("You feel stronger! +2 Strength")
    validate(True)

challenges.title: Visit the Magic Library
challenges.description: Explore the vast collection of spellbooks and magical artifacts.
challenges.code:
st.write("You browse through ancient tomes filled with mystical knowledge.")

if st.button("üìö Study some basics"):
    avatar['magic'] += 2
    new_achievement('explored_magic', 'Magic Explorer', 'You explored the arcane library')
    st.success("You feel more attuned to magic! +2 Magic")
    validate(True)

2.title: Warrior Path
2.description: Join the Warrior School and commit to martial excellence
2.intro:
**Chapter 2A: Warrior Commitment**

Time to make your first major decision! The Warrior Master offers you specialized training in combat and physical prowess.

*This choice will determine your academy specialization.*

challenges.title: Join the Warrior School
challenges.description: Commit to the path of martial excellence and physical mastery.
challenges.code:
st.write("The Warrior Master extends a training sword toward you.")
st.warning("‚öîÔ∏è This will set your specialization!")

if st.button("‚öîÔ∏è Accept Warrior Training"):
    avatar['discipline'] = 'warrior'
    avatar['strength'] += 5
    world['chosen_path'] = 'warrior'
    new_achievement('warrior_student', 'Warrior Student', 'You joined the Warrior School')
    st.success("You are now a Warrior Student! +5 Strength")
    validate(True)

4.title: Advanced Warrior
4.description: Master advanced combat techniques and battle tactics
4.intro:
**Chapter 3A: Advanced Warrior Training**

Now that you're committed to the warrior path, it's time for serious combat training. Master the advanced techniques of battle.

challenges.title: Advanced Combat Training
challenges.description: Master advanced sword techniques and battle tactics.
challenges.code:
st.write("Intensive training session with the Weapon Masters.")
st.write(f"Current Strength: {avatar.get('strength', 0)}")

if st.button("üó°Ô∏è Train intensively"):
    avatar['strength'] += 8
    avatar['health'] += 20
    new_achievement('warrior_graduate', 'Warrior Graduate', 'You completed advanced warrior training')
    new_achievement('ready_for_mastery', 'Ready for Mastery', 'You are prepared for the final trials')
    st.success("Warrior training complete! +8 Strength, +20 Health")
    validate(True)

6.title: Final Trial
6.description: Face the Academy Champion to prove your mastery
6.intro:
**Chapter 4: Academy Graduation**

You have completed your specialized training and are ready for the final academy trials. Time to graduate as a Master!

challenges.title: Final Combat Trial
challenges.description: Face the Academy Champion in single combat to prove your mastery.
challenges.code:
discipline = avatar.get('discipline', 'none')
strength = avatar.get('strength', 0)
magic = avatar.get('magic', 0)

if discipline == 'none':
    st.error("You must complete your specialization first!")
    validate(False)
    st.stop()

st.markdown("### ‚öîÔ∏è Final Combat Trial")
st.write("A mysterious Academy Champion appears, ready to test your mastery!")
st.write(f"**Your stats:** Strength: {strength}, Magic: {magic}")
st.write(f"**Your discipline:** {discipline.title()}")

st.divider()
st.write("Choose your approach to defeat the Champion:")

col1, col2 = st.columns(2)

with col1:
    if st.button("‚öîÔ∏è Physical Attack", use_container_width=True):
        if discipline == 'warrior':
            st.success("üèÜ Victory! Your warrior training serves you well!")
            st.write(f"Your {strength} Strength overwhelms the Champion!")
            new_achievement('academy_master', 'Academy Master', 'You defeated the Champion and graduated!')
            st.balloons()
            validate(True)
        else:
            st.error("üí• Defeat! Your magical training didn't prepare you for physical combat.")
            st.write(f"Your {strength} Strength wasn't enough without warrior training.")
            validate(False)

with col2:
    if st.button("‚ú® Magical Attack", use_container_width=True):
        if discipline == 'mage':
            st.success("üèÜ Victory! Your magical mastery is supreme!")
            st.write(f"Your {magic} Magic power defeats the Champion!")
            new_achievement('academy_master', 'Academy Master', 'You defeated the Champion and graduated!')
            st.balloons()
            validate(True)
        else:
            st.error("üí• Defeat! Your warrior training didn't include spellcasting.")
            st.write(f"Your {magic} Magic wasn't enough without mage training.")
            validate(False)
